product_name: Big Agnes Fairview 3 Tent - Special Buy
long_description: Take your two best friends and escape on a backpacking adventure with the Big Agnes Fairview 3-season tent. Lightweight and easy to set up, it has room for three people plus a vestibule for your gear.
short_description: Take your two best friends and escape on a backpacking adventure with the Big Agnes Fairview 3-season tent. Lightweight and easy to set up, it has room for three people plus a vestibule for your gear.
